short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds calculators and extra functionality to Generation 1 Pokemon Showdown

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is RooBY?? RooBY is a:
* Moveset distribution calculator
* Damage calculator integration
* A remaining type percentage calculator
* A calculator for other miscellaneous things (Recovery move failure, crit rates, confusion damage)
* A Showdown UI themeing tool
* A tracker/calculator for Elo and individual win records
* An extra ladder for Gen 1 mods
* A "Transform" button add-on for the official Showdown calculator

RooBY also adds extra commands:
* /unrevealed, to calculate the odds of remaining Pokemon/types/dual types for random battles
* /movesets, to show the moveset percentages for individual random battle Pokemon
* /moves, to show the move percentages for individual random battle Pokemon
* /export, to allow you to quickly copy your current battle into the official Showdown calculator

Report a bug: https://forms.gle/CpfcpSGuoNAQASBP6
